actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that certain beneficiaries of National Service Life Insurance policies may elect lump-sum settlements after attaining age 65.

summary.text: Provides that specified beneficiaries of veterans under a National Service Life Insurance policy may elect a lump-sum settlement after attaining age 65. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 717(f))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that certain beneficiaries of National Service Life Insurance policies may elect lump-sum settlements after attaining age 65.
